meanings.sent1: The sunset had an orangy glow that lit up the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her shirt was a bright orangy color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur was so orangy, it looked like a tiny pumpkin!
meanings.sent4: The leaves turned an orangy hue, painting the trees in warm tones.
meanings.sent5: The orangy paint on the walls made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of oranges.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a deliciously orangy flavor that reminded me of summer.
meanings.sent2: The air freshener filled the room with a pleasant orangy scent.
meanings.sent3: She wore a perfume with an orangy aroma that made everyone crave oranges.
meanings.sent4: The tea had an orangy tang that awakened my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The candle emitted an orangy fragrance that lingered in the air.
